summary: This bill, the "Focused Assistance and Skills Training for Veterans’ Employment and Transition Success Act" (FAST VETS Act), amends Title 38 of the United States Code to modify the conditions under which the Secretary of Veterans Affairs must redevelop a veteran's individualized vocational rehabilitation plan. It clarifies when the Secretary must review and potentially redevelop the plan based on changes in the veteran's employment situation, focusing on whether long-term rehabilitation goals are achievable.
